p: Therefore, in contrast to current catastrophic projections, resulting from the unlimited and unidirectional progress beliefs, richer subjectivities emerging from these community-led confluences help to decolonize imaginaries and deconstruct rooted development premises, expanding the fields of possibilities for desirable futures and inspiring public policies, from the very basis of society, to address the Paris Agreement and the 2030 Agenda commitments. Rather than becoming a radically opposing ideology, the Buen Vivir approach in these cases provides opportunities to meet the core aims of sustainable development through the pluriverse, as possible alternatives that go beyond the conventional anthropocentric development model.
